edu.rit.crst

Class BitGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.BitGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Adjacent, Scattered

    public abstract class BitGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class BitGroup is the abstract base class for an object that generates a series of output bit groups for a cryptographic Function.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BitGroup

        public BitGroup(int size)
        Construct a new bit group generator.
        Parameters:
        size - Bit size of this bit group (1 .. 8).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if size < 1 or size > 8.

    • Method Detail

      • setFunction

        public void setFunction(Function func)
        Set the cryptographic function for this bit group generator.

        After setting the cryptographic function, this method calls the protected generate() method to generate the bit groups.

        Parameters:
        func - Cryptographic function object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if func is null.

      • constructor

        public abstract java.lang.String constructor()
        Get a constructor expression for this bit group generator. The constructor expression can be passed to the edu.rit.util.Instance.newInstance() method to construct an object that is the same as this bit group generator.
        Returns:
        Constructor expression.

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description()
        Get a description of this bit group generator.
        Returns:
        Description.

      • count

        public int count()
        Get the number of generated bit groups.
        Returns:
        Number.

      • bitSize

        public int bitSize()
        Get the bit size of the generated bit groups.
        Returns:
        Bit size.

      • bins

        public int bins()
        Returns the number of histogram bins needed for a Test using the generated bit groups.
        Returns:
        Number of bins.

      • bitGroupDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String bitGroupDescription(int i)
        Get a description of the given bit group generated by this bit group generator.
        Parameters:
        i - Bit group index (0 .. count()−1.
        Returns:
        Description of bit group i.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if i is out of bounds.

      • bitGroups

        public void bitGroups(int[][] bgs)
        Obtain the series of bit groups for the cryptographic function. The number of rows in the given matrix must be count(). The number of columns in the given matrix must be bitSize(). On return, the bgs matrix contains the bit groups. In the matrix, each row represents one bit group. The elements of a row give the bit positions for that bit group.
        Parameters:
        bgs - Matrix in which to store bit groups.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if bgs is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the dimensions of bgs are incorrect.

      • generate

        protected abstract void generate()
        Generate a series of bit groups for the cryptographic function. This method stores the bit groups in the protected bgs matrix. In the matrix, each row represents one bit group. The elements of a row give the bit positions for that bit group.

      • adjacentBitsDescription

        protected java.lang.String adjacentBitsDescription(int i)
        Get a description of the given bit group generated by this bit group generator, where the bit positions are adjacent to each other.
        Parameters:
        i - Bit group index (0 .. count()−1.
        Returns:
        Description of bit group i.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if i is out of bounds.

      • scatteredBitsDescription

        protected java.lang.String scatteredBitsDescription(int i)
        Get a description of the given bit group generated by this bit group generator, where the bit positions are scattered.
        Parameters:
        i - Bit group index (0 .. count()−1.
        Returns:
        Description of bit group i.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if i is out of bounds.
